channel.title: XKey Updates
channel.description: XKey - Vietnamese Input Method for macOS

item.title: Version 1.2.20 (Build 20260208)
item.description:
What's New

refactor: DRY constants, extract UI components, fix build warnings

  • Deduplicate bitmask constants: MacroManager and TypingBuffer now

delegate to VNEngine as canonical source instead of duplicating values

  • MacroManager uses shared KeyCodeToCharacter.keyCodeToLetterMap
  • AppBehaviorDetector: unify terminal delays, extract helper methods

(isBuiltInRuleActive, matchRules)

  • Extract FloatingToolbarPositioning, FloatingToolbarStyle, and

WindowPinManager from toolbar controllers (~400 lines reduced)

  • Add AXErrorExtension for cleaner AXError handling
  • Fix Swift warnings: unused popLast() results, concurrency annotations
  • XKeyIM: add missing assets (AccentColor, MenuIcon), cleanup debugger
  • Bump build version to 20260208

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
